data.name: PageTitle
data.value: Saudi Yoga Committee Website Usage and Policy:

data.name: desc
data.value: In order to access the "Saudi Yoga Committee Website," you must agree to the terms and conditions outlined on the site and abide by the regulations of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Your agreement to these terms is considered unconditional, regardless of whether you are a registered user or not. Your agreement becomes effective on the date of your first use of the website. By using the site, you acknowledge that you will not upload any files that you do not have the rights to, use the site for any commercial or unsolicited emails, upload any files containing viruses, or share any materials that are defamatory, illegal, or violate public morals. Additionally, you agree not to participate in any illegal activities in Saudi Arabia through the Saudi Yoga Committee's website. When using the website of the Saudi Committee for Yoga, it is prohibited to advertise any product or service that violates any applicable laws or regulations. Additionally, any attempt to intercept the proper functioning of the website through means such as programs or procedures is not allowed. Furthermore, actions that place an unreasonable or excessively large load on the website's infrastructure are also not permitted. Certain parts of the website are restricted to registered members, and personal information may be required to access support or services electronically. By using these parts of the website, you agree that any information you provide is accurate and truthful, and you will not attempt to impersonate someone else. The Saudi Yoga Committee is committed to protecting the confidentiality and privacy of the information you provide. Your personal information will only be accessible to authorized employees who require it for their work. Your information will not be made public without your consent, and only qualified individuals will have access to it. An account may be necessary to access certain features of the website. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password and limiting access to your computer. You are also accountable for any activities that take place under your account or password. It is recommended that you use antivirus software when downloading materials from the internet, as we are not responsible for any loss, interruption, or damage to your computer or data that may occur while using this website. The Saudi Yoga Committee website may allow you to share user content, such as text, photos, videos, and audio. You own all rights to the content you share on the website and are solely responsible for it. The Saudi Yoga Committee website, including its content, features, and functions, is the property of the Saudi Yoga Committee and is protected by law. The Saudi Yoga Committee may modify or replace these terms at any time at its sole discretion. We provide this website "as is" and do not make any warranties or representations regarding its accuracy, reliability, or availability. We are not liable for any damages or losses that may arise from your use of this website. The Saudi Yoga Committee website is provided "as is" without any express or implied warranties, including but not limited to warranties of accuracy, reliability, or suitability for a particular purpose. The Saudi Yoga Committee website is not liable for any damages, including direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, arising from the use or inability to use the website or any user content posted on it. By using the website, you assume all risks and we are not responsible for any loss or damage that you may suffer because of using the website, including delays, disruptions, equipment failures, or software problems. You agree that your only recourse for any damage or loss resulting from your use of the website is to stop using it. Finally, there is no provision for compensation for any damages or losses that may occur because of using the website. You acknowledge that the Saudi Yoga Committee, its management, employees, and agents are not liable for any claims arising from your breach of the Terms and Conditions of Use or any applicable laws, either in Saudi Arabia or in your jurisdiction. All legal proceedings related to the website are governed by Saudi Arabian laws, and any disputes or claims arising from the website are subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of Saudi Arabian courts. The Saudi Yoga Committee reserves the right to terminate your access to the website without notice or reason, which may result in the deletion of all information associated with your account. Certain provisions of these Terms and Conditions, such as ownership, disclaimer of liability, compensation, and limitations of liability, will continue to apply even after termination. By registering on the website, you agree to receive communications from the Saudi Yoga Committee, including emails, newsletters, and promotional material. The Saudi Yoga Committee may modify these Terms and Conditions at any time at its sole discretion. The Saudi Yoga Committee has the right to modify these Terms and Conditions periodically. If you continue to use the website after any changes are made, it will indicate your acceptance of the updated Terms and Conditions.
